terms.title: General Terms and Conditions of Use

object.title: 1. Object
object.content: Startups AI is an Artificial Intelligence Platform focused on Startup businesses. Through our business-matchmaking service, we identify high-accuracy match possibilities between Startups and potential clients (Governments and companies that adopt open innovation as a strategy to solve their challenges), investors, business partners, other startups and Startup business experts who can help them solve business problems.

acceptance.title: 2. Acceptance
acceptance.content: By using Startups AI, the user fully accepts these rules and commits to observe them, under risk of applicable penalties. The acceptance of this instrument is essential for accessing and using any services provided by Startups AI. If you do not agree with the provisions of this instrument, you should not use them.

userAccess.title: 3. User Access
userAccess.content: Startups AI commits to using all available technical solutions to allow access to the service 24 (twenty-four) hours a day, 7 (seven) days a week. However, platform navigation may be interrupted, limited or suspended for updates, modifications or any action necessary for its proper functioning.

requirements.title: 4.1 Requirements
requirements.content: To access platform functionalities, prior registration is required, providing complete, recent and valid data. The user commits to keeping their data updated and truthful. Minors under 18 must obtain consent from their legal guardians to use the platform.

process.title: 4.2 Registration Process
process.content: When registering, the user must provide complete, recent and valid data, being solely responsible for keeping said data updated, and the user commits to the truthfulness of the provided data. The user must provide a valid email address, through which the platform will conduct all necessary communications. After registration confirmation, the user will have a personal login and password, which ensures individual access to the platform. Thus, the user is exclusively responsible for maintaining said password confidentially and securely, avoiding unauthorized access to personal information.

description.title: 5.1 Services Description
description.content: Startups AI provides a set of features and tools to optimize the use of its business-matchmaking services, including:
list: Identification of potential clients for startups

usage.title: 5.2 Service Usage
usage.content: The services offered are described on the platform with the highest possible degree of accuracy. Before finalizing any service contracting, the user should inform themselves about its specifications and purpose.

policy.title: 6.1 Pricing Policy
policy.content: Startups AI reserves the right to unilaterally adjust service values at any time without prior consultation or consent from the user. The applied values are those in effect at the time of order.

payment.title: 6.2 Payment Method
payment.content: When contracting a service, the platform may request user financial information, such as tax ID, billing address, and card details. By entering said data, the user agrees to be charged according to the chosen payment method at the prices current and informed at the time of contracting. Said financial data may be stored to facilitate future access and contracting.

renewal.title: 6.3 Service Renewal
renewal.content: Service contracting may be automatically renewed by the platform, regardless of communication to the user, through periodic charging of the same payment method indicated by the user when contracting the service.

policy.title: 7.1 Cancellation Policy
policy.content: The user may cancel service contracting according to the terms defined at the time of contracting. Additionally, the user may cancel services within 7 (seven) days after contracting, through contact with the platform, in accordance with consumer protection laws.

reasons.title: 7.2 Reasons for Cancellation
reasons.content: The service may be cancelled by:
list: User's part: under these conditions, services will only cease when the current cycle at the time of cancellation is completed
Terms of Use Violation: services will be immediately terminated

contact.title: 8.1 Support Contact
contact.content: For questions, suggestions or problems, the user can contact support through the email support@startupsai.com.br

hours.title: 8.2 Service Hours
hours.content: User support service is available Monday to Friday, from 9am to 6pm.

user.title: 9.1 User Responsibilities
list: Correct use of the platform, ensuring good coexistence and respect among users
Compliance with the rules set forth in these Terms and applicable legislation
Protection of account access data (login and password)

platform.title: 9.2 Platform Responsibilities
list: Indicating the characteristics of offered services
Information disclosed by it on the platform
Illicit activities carried out through its platform

intellectual.title: 10.1 Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: Startups AI's intellectual property contents and assets are protected by copyright and industrial property laws. Platform use is personal and non-transferable, with any unauthorized use being prohibited.

license.title: 10.2 Usage License
license.content: These Terms of Use grant users a non-exclusive, non-transferable and non-sublicensable license to access and make use of the platform and services and products made available by it.

sanctions.title: 11. Sanctions
sanctions.content: Startups AI may, at any time, warn, suspend or cancel the account of users who violate any provision of these Terms or engage in fraudulent behavior.

termination.title: 12. Termination
termination.content: Non-compliance with the obligations agreed in these Terms may result in immediate unilateral termination by Startups AI and blocking of all services provided to the user.

changes.title: 13. Changes
changes.content: The items described in this instrument may be unilaterally changed at any time by Startups AI. Changes will be informed on the platform, and it is up to the user to choose to accept the new content or cancel the use of services.

privacy.title: 14. Privacy Policy
privacy.content: The user must consent to the provisions contained in Startups AI's Privacy Policy.

jurisdiction.title: 15. Jurisdiction
jurisdiction.content: For the resolution of disputes arising from this instrument, Brazilian Law will be fully applied. Any litigation must be presented in the jurisdiction where the company's headquarters is located.
